ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENT(S):INACTIVAED ND VIRUS CLONE 30 STRAIN >=50 PD50UNITS PER DOSE.INACTIVATED GUMBORO D78 VIRUS >=14.5 LOG2 VN UNITS PER DOSE.CONSTITUENTS OF THE ADJUVANT : LIQUID PARAFFIN   430MG PER ML.CONSTITUENTS OF THHE EXCIPIENTS : POLYSORBATE 80  17.6 MG PER MLSORBITAN MONO-OLEATE  55.4 MG PER ML  GLYCINE  5 MG PER MLFORMALDEHYDE  < 0.05% PER ML  WATER FOR INJECTION  TO 1.0 ML
